author: MovieGasm‍․com
description:
The magic returns.
In NOW YOU SEE ME: NOW YOU DON’T (2025), the legendary Horsemen are back for one final illusion — and this time, the stakes are global. When a mysterious new mastermind challenges their loyalty, the team must pull off the most dangerous heist trick ever attempted.

💫 Experience jaw-dropping heists, mind-bending twists, and the return of the world’s greatest illusionists in this FINAL EXTENDED 4K trailer of Now You See Me 3.

NOW YOU SEE ME NOW YOU DON'T Final Official Trailer (2025) The Horseman Are Back EXTENDED 4K + Clips

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.

Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.
